foreignData.name: Rayne, Kanzlerin der Akademie
foreignData.text: Immer wenn Du oder eine bleibende Karte, die Du kontrollierst, das Ziel eines von einem Deinem Gegner kontrollierten Zauberspruchs oder einer von einem Gegner kontrollierten Fähigkeit wird, kannst Du eine Karte ziehen. Wenn Rayne, Kanzlerin der Akademie, verzaubert ist, kannst Du dann zusätzlich noch eine weitere Karte ziehen.

foreignData.name: アカデミーの事務局長レイン

name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
originalText: Whenever you or a permanent you control is the target of a spell or ability controlled by one of your opponents, you may draw a card, and if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted, you may draw another card.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability targets multiple permanents you control or targets you and one or more of your permanents, this triggers once for each such target.
The “if” in the card text does not have a special meaning. You check if this card is enchanted when the ability resolves and draw 1 or 2 cards.
When casting an Aura on this card, the triggered ability will resolve before the Aura enters the battlefield.

text: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.
